name: Robohazard 2077
description:
2000, a certain corporation developed biological weapons and activated them in the capital of one of the largest states. People began to turn into zombies, and the surviving people fought with each other for food, the cities were allowed to go. Soon, the epidemic spread to other states, but a group of people in Australia managed to freeze their bodies in cryochambers made for similar disasters. 2077, our hero Meep wakes up and is surprised, because none of his friends are in the cameras, but his hands have become robotic, and, having gone a little further, Mip does not understand what is happening - because he was attacked by robots.
You play as Meep, who woke up in the post-apocalyptic future, and you have no choice but to destroy all the robots, and also try to find traces of the former civilization ...
Features:
-Genre: 3D shooter
-Setting: Future, post-apocalypse in alternate reality
-Various opponents
-Differebt weapons
-Deadly traps
-Various locations from close corridors of laboratories to the streets that have become empty after the apocalypse
-Unreal Engine 4 Engine
-Soundtrack from Russian composers Graffeeets prod
